comments:
When I attempt to synchonize org.eclipse.ui with the Repository I get the 
following exception

4 org.eclipse.team.ui 1 Internal error
org.eclipse.team.core.TeamException: Error retrieving remote resource tree. 
Parent is not managed
	at org.eclipse.team.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider.getRemoteSyncTree
(CVSTeamProvider.java:573)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSSyncCompareInput.createSyncElements
(CVSSyncCompareInput.java:64)
	at org.eclipse.team.ui.sync.SyncCompareInput.prepareInput
(SyncCompareInput.java:200)
	at org.eclipse.compare.CompareEditorInput.run
(CompareEditorInput.java:289)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:98)

Based on the exception location in the code, it looks like your CVS 
meta-information got trampled on. What scenario lead to this? Also, would you 
happen to still have the project directory and its contents that caused the 
problem?

If I ran the 20020205 build using the new CVS support and the old pde 
selfhosting this happened. I was also using a workspace that had been put 
together using the old CVS support.
*** Bug 9123 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I have cleaned up the error reporting so a more meaningfull error condition is 
reported.

traces.message: Error retrieving remote resource tree.  Parent is not managed
